original_text: And the people flew upon the spoil, and took sheep, and oxen, and calves, and slew them on the ground: and the people did eat them with the blood.
korean_text: 백성이 이에 탈취한 물건에 달려가서 양과 소와 송아지들을 끌어다가 그것을 땅에서 잡아 피째 먹었더니

sentences.original_text: And the people flew upon the spoil
and took sheep, and oxen, and calves
and slew them on the ground
and the people did eat them with the blood
sentences.korean_translation: 백성들이 그 피와 함께 그것을 먹었다
